name: ROBLOX 2019 [REVAMPED]
description:
So I happened to stumble upon a style called "ROBLOX 2019", and here's my version of it!

I fixed some stuff and optimized it. Hope you like it! (it also comes with a ad-blocker if you don't already have one)

Other Versions:
ROBLOX 2019 (Optimized - READ DESCRIPTION): https://userstyles.org/styles/168320/roblox-2019-optimized
ROBLOX 2019 (No Glow/Shadow): https://userstyles.org/styles/168319/roblox-2019-no-glow-shadow
Recommended with: https://userstyles.org/styles/165972/dark-roblox-revamped
additional_info:
Released!

Version 1.1

- Lighter header shadow

Version 1.2

- Removed logo-sort-of credit from the creator since it was blocking the original roblox logo on trades tab





Credits: kickedbyconsole

discussions.name: Good but could use some cute clean improvement like lines around the games when you hover over them
Is there a Roblox 2020 one now? Or is that coming soon?
